scripts.test:chromium: cross-env BROWSER=chromium npx cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register/transpile-only --require tests/steps/common.steps.ts --require tests/steps/home.steps.ts --require tests/steps/login.steps.ts --require tests/steps/feedback.steps.ts --parallel 4 tests/features
